mapper.update: update agent_th_apply_cash set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_amount = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bank_transfer_amount = #{bankTransferAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_transfer_time = #{bankTransferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, apply_amount, apply_time, bank_transfer_amount, bank_transfer_time, status, update_time, update_user from agent_th_apply_cash where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
